task_descriptions: You are interested in viewing an apartment. Please schedule a viewing at `ApartmentName-1@schedule` for `Day-1@schedule` at `StartTimeHour-1@schedule`. Your name is `PersonName-1@schedule`. You cannot remember if you had payed the application fee.
linear_guide: Say hallo to the AI Assistant.
You suddenly remember that you have a `ImportantMeeting@generic` on `Day-1@schedule` at `StartTimeHour-1@schedule`.
Ask something about the apartment, or engage in smalltalk, or make a joke.

You cannot remember if you had payed the application fee. Find a way to make an appointment anyway. If no date is available, change date and/or time until something works. If you already got the appointment, engage in smalltalk.
Once you've scheduled the viewing, say something about your `ImportantMeeting@generic`.
When you are done with all the instructions, bring the conversation to a natural close.

Wizard.task_description: Help the user schedule an apartment viewing.
